tos.title: Notification Platform
tos.body: Before accessing, accept the Terms and conditions of use of the service and read the Privacy Policy.
tos.redo-body: The Privacy policy and the Terms and conditions are changed. Before accessing, read and accept the new version.
tos.switchLabel: I accept the <0>Terms and conditions of use</0> and confirm that I have read <1>the Privacy Policy</1>.
